no entry for sendmail.  the only mail-related package i've installed manually (over Gutsy) is mailx to get the "mail" command

sudo dpkg-reconfigure exim4-config and select "mail sent by smarthost; no local mail"
bah, putting a real email in here was probably a bad idea, given spam spidering these logs
and then go through the rest of the config, there is a lto of explanation in the dpkg program and google for the rest cause I don't know what would be perfect for you
